        @Deprecated
public GetChildAreaTablesMethodCall addAreas(List<Area> areas)
        Deprecated. 
        Behaviour changed from parent -- now it only takes the first area in areas. Try to use addParentArea(Area) instead.
        Overrides:

      • getTables

        public List<Dataset> getTables()
                        throws XPathExpressionException,
                               ParserConfigurationException,
                               SAXException,
                               IOException,
                               NDE2Exception,
                               NullPointerException,
                               ParseException
        Description copied from class: GetTablesMethodCall
        Calls the NDE2 Delivery service, requesting tables for the areas, dataset families or variable families specified in this GetTablesMethodCall.

        Note: This method is fairly long, and it connects to a remote host. It may take a while. There is nothing I can do to make it less painful. You should use it asynchronously.

        Overrides:
        getTables in class GetTablesMethodCall
        Returns:
        A list of tables, represented by Datasets, that contain the requested data.
        Throws:
        XPathExpressionException
        ParserConfigurationException
        SAXException
        IOException
        NDE2Exception - Thrown if the server returns an error-type response
        NullPointerException - Thrown if there are no DataSetFamilies or VariableFamilies specified. You should include at least one DataSetFamiliy.
        ParseException
